data.title: ACF Image Fields Changing Filename of Image
data.meta_description: [This thread is closed.] I’m having trouble with my images being broken. I noticed the file name was changing after I would publish the post. I…
data.text:
I’m having trouble with my images being broken.

I noticed the file name was changing after I would publish the post.

I tested to see if it happened when I posted a featured image through WP field, and it didn’t happen.

This just started happening randomly, I don’t think I made any changes to ACF. I did migrate over from staging, which could’ve caused the issue, but I already talked to Siteground and weren’t able to pinpoint it.

I finally noticed it was only happening through ACF fields.

Has anyone had experience with this?
